description: John the Baptist in prison in chains holding a cross; lamb at his feet; man and boy outside of cell looking through bars; in distance at left Jesus preaches to a crowd
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in image lower lright corner: H.C.F. | on sheet below image in black: CHRISTVS IESVS inter nato mulierum meminem Prophetarum IOANNE BAPTISTA: / sed minorem in rgeno Dei, maiorem illo esse dixit. Luca 7   Sadl excud | on sheet in pencil: 2-348
title: Print
